Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Ashland
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Damen, 67th, Ashland, and 63rd due to a building fire near 63rd/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Damen, 67th, Ashland, and 63rd due to a building fire near 63rd/Ashland.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Western (FP)
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (FP) due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Western (FP) due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
